{"step_by_step_thinking": "Ustekinumab is a type of medication used to treat certain autoimmune diseases. It is a monoclonal antibody, not a polyclonal antibody. Monoclonal antibodies are produced from a single clone of cells and are specific for a single antigen, while polyclonal antibodies are produced by different clones of cells and can bind to multiple antigens.", "answer_choice": "B"}
